gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFund` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFund` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `InvestmentsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`InvestmentsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundOtherMovementSpecificationPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
